summary: This mod will transform you in werewolf form in random periods of time. You can change how often in the MCM.
descriptionHtml:
This mod will transform you in werewolf form in random periods of time. You can change how often in the MCM.
You don't need to have werewolf transformation spell to be randomly transformed and if you have the spell, it won't go on cooldown after
random transformation.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863/?]SkyUI[/url] is required.

[u][b]Options in MCM[/b][/u]
- Enable/disable the mod
- Min and max values of the pause between transformations. Actual pause value will be randomly taken between these values.
- Disable random transformations in interiors.

[b][u]Compatibility[/u][/b]
Doesn't change any object in the game ([url=http://i.imgur.com/TKB33vq.png]esp details[/url]). Should be compatible with anything.
author: Genebriss
